title: Game is changing my monitor's refresh rate
body: It just started today, despite there being no patch.  What is going on?

replies.body:
Yep still no fix... this started to happen (at least for me) in Feb. last year (2016) when I switched to Windows 10, League just doesn't respect what you have set in Display Options (for me it's 60Hz). My monitor is able to pull 75Hz max so when I switch to Fullscreen it switches from 60>75 :/ I can't play in Borderless or Window Mode anymore as my i5 pc broke and I was forced to go back to my dual core pc for a few months and, just noticed that I have a lot more FPS and better performance in Fullscreen mode :/

Wish they would fix it already. . .

This is part of a known issue listed on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) that causes issues under fullscreen mode. I've been informed that you should be able to resolve this by switching to *Windowed Mode* or *Borderless Mode* in-game under your **VIDEO** settings.

Since this is a known issue, we're looking into a solution, but I can't provide an ETA on that fix right now. Let me know if you have any questions.
any update on this? Still happening for me.
I still have this problem. I can't play at fullscreen mode.
Still happening, no longer listed on status page. Drops my HDTV from 120Hz and 120FPS to 60Hz and 60 fps, v-sync on of course. Frame cap set to 120.
I don't know i do have the exact same problem after patch 7.1...{{champion:32}}
